price: 2. Waa kuwa markay wax beegan u oofsada si dhan oo kaamil ah.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
